```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("tidyverse")
library("ggplot2")
library("bootstrap")
library("magrittr")
```


```{r}
data(law)
law %<>% add_column(observation = 1:nrow(law), .before = 1)
ggplot(law, aes(x = LSAT, y = GPA)) +
geom_text(aes(label = observation),
hjust = 0, vjust = 0)
```
